ana šar mātāti bēlīya aradka Bel-ušezib Bel Nabu u Šamaš ana šarri bēlīya likrubū  x x x UD x-KAM₂ Šibu ana Sin iṭhi 1 Šibu ana muhhi Sin SI4-ma izziz šarru ina litti illak x x x x x x x x x x x x+x māssu urtappeš  x x x x x x x x x x x x+x uktappat x x x x x x x x x x x x x AN hur x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-ṣu x x x x x x x x x x+x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ušuzzū x x x x x x x x x x x x x x umaššaramma mamma x x x x x x x x x x-ma Sin-eriba x x x x x x x x x x ša Iddin-ahi bēl hīṭu x x x x x x x x x x x-bi u ana šarri ina muhhīšu x x x x x x x x x x īmurūma mamma x x x x x x x x x x-na-an-ni pānīšu ana x x x x x x x x x x+x-su šarru lā ittašu x x x x x x x x x x illak  x x x x x x x x x x x-šu₂ ittasaq x x x x x x x x x rēssu lišši x x x x x x x x x x ana Ṣillaya x x x x x x ana šarri bēlīya lū medi
